title: Magic Spells - Volume Two
description: 100+ High Quality Magic Spells for your game! :D
longDescription:
Hi there!


This is the volume two of the pack "Magic Skills" here you'll find Wind, Water, Ice, Fire, Dark and other styles of spells sounds, hope you like it! Here's the list:

  2. Dark_Magic_02
  3. Dark_Magic_03
